entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet new android` attempts to restore Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-arm64 #19891
    Area-External, untriaged
  • `error MC1000: Unknown build error` when using reference assembly and XAML #19884
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Xunit output from dotnet test truncated #19883
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • ContinuousIntegrationBuild=true produces nondeterministic source paths by default #19881
    untriaged
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web incorrectly sets LangVer to Preview for VB in Visual Studio only #19879
    Area-External, untriaged
  • WPF/Winforms fails to run. #19871
    untriaged
  • manifest authoring or manifest reading is broken for the latest stage 0 #19866
    release blocking, Area-Workloads
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main sdk, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #sdk-102567-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #19862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Closed

  • dotnet globally installed tools being killed immediately #19240
    Area-Tools
  • Ensure <Using /> declarations from in-box SDKs are conditioned on C# #19793
    untriaged, Area-ImplicitUsings
  • Remove ImplicitUsings=enable from test after stage 0 SDK is updated #19696
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK, 6.0.1xx

Updated

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #sdk-102548-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #19861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1 #sdk-102550-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC1 #19859
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Could add parameters(--local/remote) for workload command? #19755
    Area-Workloads, Discussion
  • Some tests fail on Linux (CI doesn't run all tests) #19783
    Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.1xx
  • /Users/USERNAME/.dotnet/sdk-advertising-temp/ cannot be accessed #19523
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • Maui: Workload installation failed: The transaction has aborted #19739
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • Update implicit global usings feature to address issues #19521
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK, 6.0.1xx
  • UserSecretsId attribute not generated when M.E.C.UserSecrets reference transitively #4007
  • Is there a way to package a binary as a global tool #9503
    tool, Backlog
  • Something changed in VS 2022 Preview 3 and VS 2019 16.11 that breaks VB WinForms Apps #19735
    Area-External, Area-NetSDK, Discussion
  • Publishing standalone app (C#) fails with C++/CLI dependency #12345
    6.0.1xx
  • Cannot get symbol ucol_setMaxVariable_50 from libicui18n #16009
    untriaged
  • Add workload force clean option #19603
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract includes XML and other files into output binary #19322
    Bug, Area-SingleFile, 6.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/windowsdesktop #19911
  • Opt into the RAR precomputed cache #19910
  • Differentiate between long and short run property options #19909
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn-analyzers #19908
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19907
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Increment the package version for Compatibility package #19906
    Area-Compatibility
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/windowsdesktop #19905
  • Adding sdk check config file #19904
    source-build, Area-CLI
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from mono/linker #19903
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Cherry pick main changes #19902
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix sdkversion #19901
    Area-Workloads
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #19900
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19897
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from mono/linker #19896
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19895
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Follow up to global usings changes #19890
    Area-External
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #19886
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #19885
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Fix workload update #19882
    Area-Workloads
  • Restore preferred packages functionality #19878
    Area-NuGet
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/format #19877
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [Static web assets] Account for HintPath when we compute the build assets #19873
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

    Area-Workloads

    Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from nuget/nuget.client #19808
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from nuget/nuget.client #19807
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [Package Validation] resolve references when running API Compat #19771
    Area-Compatibility
  • Check that SDK and app archs match before setting `DOTNET_ROOT` when using `dotnet run` #19860
    Area-External, Team:Runtime
  • Update Versions.props for 7.0 branding #19800
    Branding
  • Handle multiple WinRT components. #19218
    Servicing-consider
  • Cache results of ResolveTargetingPackAssets across builds #19570
    Area-NetSDK
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #19824
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Change dotnet-new output encoding to utf8 #19847
    Area-External, 7.0.1xx
  • Could not copy the file deps.json because it was not found. Microsoft.Common.CurrentVersion.targets #17943
  • Implicit RID support #19725
    Area-External
